entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries along the southern shore. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries along the southern shore. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 06 January 2023
